website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to bottle capacity, precise cooling, and design, you won't find a better wine cooler on the market today.
pros: Dual temperature zones, vibration-free thermoelectric cooling, stainless steel racks, and 24-bottle capacity
cons: The fit is snug for larger bottles (like champagne)

customer_reviews.title: Best wine chiller for the price!
customer_reviews.text: After an exhaustive and confusing search I settled on this wine chiller based on a Chicago Tribune article on the best wine chillers under $400. I have had this chiller for four days and it is perfect. The upper part holds 12 bottles and it has been holding steady at 55 degrees while the bottom half, which also holds 12 bottles has been holding steady at 48 degrees. The motor isn’t completely silent, but it is very quiet. The racks are steel and can be turned over to accommodate fatter bottles like Pinot noir which makes it easy to fit 24 bottles as stated. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: So far, I dig it
customer_reviews.text: This wine frog seems to work well. I particularly like the dual zones for white and red wines. The temperature seems to keep stable (it is summer and super hot right now, so this is a plus). The back of the fridge had a little ding causing the back corner to not be flush with the rest of the body - likely happened in delivery. I'm not particularly concerned about that, it works well and is an attractive addition to my decor.
customer_reviews.author: XReviewer

customer_reviews.title: The second one works fine. It has narrow bottle slots compared to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The first machine had a faulty dual control, so had to be returned. The second one works fine. It has narrow bottle slots compared to the pricier units my friends have built-in. But for the money and convenience and good looks, this is a fine choice.
customer_reviews.author: linda talbert

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dual temperature control. Does go crazy and run forever if you open the door for a few moments. Haven't encountered the 'removing shelves' issue. It is snug at times but I have the whole thing filled. Occasionally I take out a rack and put larger bottles in but fantastic value for the money. Pretty quiet/slight hum when it's cooling. Otherwise, you don't hear it Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Wm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for us. Reasonably priced, very quiet and holds temperature in both red and white sections.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Died early on, Whynter customer service a joke
customer_reviews.text: Our cooler died after about two months. Trying to work with Whynter customer service was a joke - took a week or so between emails, they insisted on sending photos of how the unit was set up, etc. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Viraj Mirani

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure... but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for red and white wines but it seem like it doesn't hold temp to good. My wine seems a bit warm when you take them out. Plus didn't notice till I opened box that the back had a dent in it but to late to send back cause I had already broke down box into pieces. But it is a good looking fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dual Temperature Fridge should store red AND whites, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 24 bottle wine fridge for Christmas to replace my 18 bottle Wine Enthusiast fridge that died (after 10 years). Having just set it up, my first impression is good HOWEVER, the wine shelf spacing will not allow normal storage of sparkling wine bottles nor my Kendall Jackson Grand Reserve Chardonnay bottles...really?? I had to remove the bottom wire shelf and stack the bottles as a work around. Just a little more vertical white wine space in the fridge design would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Stewart

customer_reviews.title: We have been pleased with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product has the red wine storage in the top section and white in the bottom. It has space provided (according to the literature) for 24 bottles, however it depends on the diameter of the bottle. We have been pleased with our purchase, but it appeared to be a product that would not be put on display because of a dent and a small section on the back of the product that was missing. However, we are still pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible item  Whynter  wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler has nor worked since it has been delivered. We even had service person come out ( last week) & hopefully repair this, but was told it could not be repaired. I know we are past the return date. We tried to return it -but, because we hadn't packed it sufficiently - unable to return. Would never reccomend this item. It really doesn't deserve a star rating. Maybe a minus star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect Christmas gift for my hubby!
customer_reviews.text: The dual zones work perfectly. It is very quiet--I dont hear anything! We are very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to store beer and wine. Quiet operation, beverages stay cold.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D.  Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Hardly makes any noise, the temp control is awesome with the divider. The only thing I'd change is a temp lock button. My 2 yr old can change the temp without me noticing sometimes because there's no button to lock the set temps.
customer_reviews.author: MT Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lower chamber quit being able to cool below 52 degrees.
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, modern and quiet. I had the top chamber at 65 degrees and the lower chamber at 46 degrees. After 7n months, the lower chamber can only go down to 52 degrees, even though it is set at 46 degrees. Tried contacting seller but have not heard back. I'm still hoping but would not recommend this product until this issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Art I.

customer_reviews.title: great dual temp control
customer_reviews.text: keeps wine chilled at set temps. not very noisy. lots of space. very pleased with product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: error message kept flashing
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about 4-5 months and then an error message kept flashing on the temperature area...it still cooled, but could not regulate the temperature anymore and the light went out.. not happy with this product and would not buy this brand again.So frustrating..I would need to send back and pay shipping..so I feel it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE FISHER

customer_reviews.title: Great  wine refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I love the fridge. Very quiet. The only down feature that the bigger bottles can only be held on top (3 bottles). We liked our first one so much we ordered a second one. Haven't had any issues with it at all. Plan to order a 3rd one.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit!!
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived with no dents, scratches, etc... unboxed, set up, set the upper/lower temps, put bottles in and has maintained a consistent 54 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: TF-Chicago

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as summer was coming on and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as summer was coming on and I had to get my wine into storage to keep it from heating. It has worked well with maintaining my wine at long term storage temperatures. Cons The bottom zone does not maintain temperature as well when the room gets hot. I have my top zone set to 57 degrees and my bottom zone sent to 47. If my condo gets above 80 degrees the lower zone will slowly creep up. It will level out at 57 degrees and maintain the temperature with the top zone. This still keeps the wine in storage temperature but above serving temperature for my whites.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Cool wine
customer_reviews.text: 24 bottles 2 zones!! You can't beat that with a stick. Fans are getting a little out of tune (running at different speeds) not sure if there is an adjustment I can make . . .
customer_reviews.author: Peter W. Sebelius

customer_reviews.title: Already broken after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple months ago. Was working well for the first 1-2 months. Now it’s really loud and the bottom temp won’t go above 54 degrees. I already have to call in the warranty as it’s broken. Very nice looking but be cautious before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Denio Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great size and perfect for our laundry room! Easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Wine bottle perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love this frig. Fits nicely in corner of my kitchen and blends well with all the other appliances. Roomy for many bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wine Coo
customer_reviews.text: So much better then I thought. Very pleased with this purchase. Great looking, great value and works well.
customer_reviews.author: David Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Wine Cooler Coolness
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, holds temperature and good access. Sometimes the shelves get a bit finicky coming out, but that's minor.
customer_reviews.author: Rachtiger

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are positive
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Unit looks very nice with zero finish defects. Loaded it up with room-temperature we be and all temps were stabilized in less than 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator fan/motor never stops running. It’s annoyingly loud even though level.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Shelves fit poorly
customer_reviews.text: The shelves fit very poorly, if they have 3 bottles on a shelf and pull it out more than a few inches it falls out of its track and crashes down on the bottles below. Also you have to open the door well past 90 degrees to pull out a shelf at all
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, can’t return
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware....they don’t accept returns. Can’t rate much about the actual product, but it’s in returnable which is enough for a low rating.update: 4 stars for customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: white wine section does not get cold enough
customer_reviews.text: After being on for days, I cannot get the white wine section down below 52° even though it’s set at 46°. I like the look of the cooler, red section keeps wine at 54°, but white wine section does not get cold enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured... great size.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and its appearance. The fan was quiet but not as quiet as I would have liked... but I'm quickly getting adjusted to it. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: looked good, but had to send back because bottom half did not cool
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Dented 😠
customer_reviews.text: I like the wine cooler, but just like I’ve read on other reviews and different sites the products are shipped out with dents on them like they’ve been used definitely not worth the price, but it works fine, pissed I’m forced to cover up something that I paid my hard money on
customer_reviews.author: stacey valentine

customer_reviews.title: Whynter Wins!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with 2 zones for red and white wines.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fridge but a little noisy with its fans. Keeps wine cold though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Fridge with great storage
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised on how easy this wine cooler handles. It is very quiet and fits standard wine bottles as described. Bulkier Pinot Noir bottles are a tight fit but all else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works Great1
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have it , is the light. Only a light on the top not on the bottom, seams to work great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: jettson

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for now, but refrigerator is warped on top.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the package. Looks like it is working fine for now, but thé top part is warped. I am leaving it for now because it is plastic and it may go back to the original form. I also took a few pictures. Does anyone know what is the return policy and who pays for shipment? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged--but Box was Not
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived intact and undamaged. The cooler, however, had a significant dent on the top back right corner. It must have been packaged that way.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Good but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The cooler looks good but it arrived damanged in the back. One of the screws wasn’t there. It’s amazing that the final check at the manufacturer didn’t catch this. I decided to live with it as resending it will be a hassle. Otherwise it is a good size product.
customer_reviews.author: NAR

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: It is VERY QUIET! Works well, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Just Saying

customer_reviews.title: Damaged during shipping. Material used on the exterior are very thin
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with the features and it's operation. That being said...The materials that the make up the exterior of the unit seems to be very lightweight (thin metal) The back side and side panel back edges of the unit were damaged during shipping. It seemed to be only cosmetic. I did not want to hassle with returning it and getting a new one. I removed the rear panel bent it back into shape as well as the back edges of the side panel and reassembled it. SO far the unit is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not for Pinot or Champagne
customer_reviews.text: Cools quickly, works well, but the shelves are too close together. Pinot noir bottles and Champagne will only fit on the top shelf. All of the other shelves are one inch narrower.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Shydohub

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Just what I expected and cost much less that the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: p carson

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and works well. Arrived quickly in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Vian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for its cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for its cost. It provides enough room for reds and white wines. Looks great and runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and capacity. It is working as described.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Taylor

customer_reviews.title: NO LIGHT ON BOTTOM SECTION
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice until someone asked why the light on the bottom wasn't working. Looked in the manual. There is a divider halfway in the unit that separates the red from the white wine and it has to be removed to enable the light to brighten the bottom. If separator is installed to allow 2 different temperatures for the wine then the bottom will appear dark. Pull it out you got light in the entire unit but no temperature gradient. Who designed this needs to be fired. Sending it back. Nowhere in the description that I found will it tell you this. Good for someone who does not care about the temperature. FAULTY DESIGN!!! Just received today.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: I like it otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a built in type. I like it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Joan V.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: None f the controls on the front of the door operate.
customer_reviews.author: LC

product_meta.title: Whynter WC-241DS 24 Bottle Dual Zone Thermoelectric Wine Coolers, Black with Stainless Steel Trim
product_meta.description: Whynter wine coolers offer premium quality and innovative design. Whether for the office, the bar or home, Whynter wine coolers are a center piece of any entertaining space.The Whynter WC-241DS 24 Bottle Dual Zone Touch Control Stainless Trim Wine Cooler is an outstanding wine storage solution for any small space. This compact wine cooler can securely accommodate up to 24 of your best 750ml wine bottles. It is equipped with dual-temperature zones to appropriately store both your reds and whites. The Whynter WC-241DS Wine Cooler is the perfect addition to any area with its interior light display, sleek black cabinet, and stainless steel trim dual-pane glass door.Quiet and Vibration-Free CoolingOperating on a thermoelectric cooling system, the Whynter WC-241DS is energy efficient and runs quietly. This cooling method generates minimal noise and also keeps vibration of the unit at an absolute minimum, ensuring the delicate wine sediment is not agitated.Dual Zone StorageThis unit features two distinct temperature sections allowing you to maintain specific temperatures for different wine varietals.Digital Temperature Control and Soft Internal LightingEffortlessly control the LED light and temperature settings of your wine cooler using the digital control panel located on the door. To minimize internal temperature fluctuation,do not add large amount of contents at once
feature_bullets: Measures: 20.5" Long x 14" Wide x 33.5" High. Soft interior LED lighting with on/off switch
Total capacity: 24 wine bottles, Upper Zone capacity- 12 bottles, Lower Zone capacity- 12 bottles. Voltage: 115V /60Hz. Power: 100 watts / 1.4 Amps
Vibration-free thermoelectric cooling, dual zones for different wine varietals with adjustable thermostat for both zones: Upper Zone 54ºF - 66ºF, Lower Zone 46ºF - 66ºF
Space saving design, 6 premium stainless steel trimmed scalloped shelves, 1 zone divider, recessed handle

Internal fan-forced circulation for even temperature distribution throughout the cabinet. Ensure there is at least 20 of clearance from the air intake air filter area and keep the length of the exhaust hose is as short and straight as possible ,do not block or cover the air exhaust

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
